attributes.action: ensure Britain has well-funded, well-provisioned, well-trained armed forces including a properly operational blue water fleet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The defence of the realm is the first priority of all governments. Spending on defence has declined to some 2.2 per cent of GDP, its lowest since 1930. At the same time, global commitments of the armed forces have increased. Treasury-inspired accounting is leaving the armed forces, and the nation, vulnerable. Spending on the armed forces should be increased to a level commensurate with Britain's international obligations and responsibilities as a permanent member of the UN Security Council; commensurate with a well-funded, well-provisioned, well-trained armed services; and commensurate with or better than the percentage GDP spent on defence by similar wealthy nations.
